'''Blitzara''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] that first appeared in the Event [[Fabulous Fungus Frenzy]].

==Profile==
''(To be added.)''

===Appearance===
Blitzara takes on the appearance of a [[Whirling Electro Fungus]]. During combat in the event Fabulous Fungus Frenzy, like all Whirling Electro Fungi, Blitzara appeared in its Scorched state.

==Quests and Events==
{{Quests and Events}}

==Trivia==
* In the Chinese-exclusive Web Event [[Taking Pictures and Recounting Good Times]], Layla and the Traveler visit [[Twirly-Whirly]], [[Bongo-Head]], and Blitzara on [[Taking Pictures and Recounting Good Times/Layla/2022-12-19|Layla's birthday in 2022]].
